name: inertia
desc: Public entry point for the Inertia Dart package.

name: AlwaysProp
desc: Defines a prop that always resolves for every response.

name: AlwaysProp.new
desc: Creates an always-included prop backed by resolver.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves the prop and caches the value for reuse.

name: resolver
desc: The resolver that produces the prop value.

name: shouldInclude
desc: Whether this prop should be included.

name: AssertableInertia
desc: Provides fluent assertions for Inertia page payloads.

name: AssertableInertia.new
desc: Creates an assertion helper for an Inertia page payload.

name: component
desc: Asserts the page component matches expected.

name: has
desc: Asserts that a prop exists at path.

name: missing
desc: Asserts that a prop is missing at path.

name: page
desc: The raw page payload.

name: props
desc: The props map extracted from page.

name: url
desc: Asserts the page URL matches expected.

name: version
desc: Asserts the asset version matches expected.

name: where
desc: Asserts the prop at path matches expected.

name: DeferrableProp
desc: Marker interface for props that resolve on deferred requests.

name: group
desc: The deferred group name.

name: shouldDefer
desc: Whether the prop should defer resolution.

name: DeferredProp
desc: Defines a prop that resolves only when its deferred group is requested.

name: DeferredProp.new
desc: Creates a deferred prop backed by resolver.

name: append
desc: Appends to a merge path and returns this prop for chaining.

name: appendsAtPaths
desc: The configured append paths.

name: appendsAtRoot
desc: Whether appends happen at the root.

name: as
desc: Sets the once key.

name: configureDeepMerge
desc: Enables or disables deep merge behavior.

name: configureDeferred
desc: Enables deferral and optionally sets the group.

name: configureMatchOn
desc: Configures match-on keys from a string or string iterable.

name: configureMerge
desc: Enables or disables merge behavior.

name: configureOnce
desc: Enables once resolution and configures optional metadata.

name: deepMerge
desc: Enables or disables deep merge behavior.

name: fresh
desc: Enables or disables refresh behavior for once props.

name: group
desc: The deferred group name.

name: matchOn
desc: Adds a match-on key for merge semantics.

name: matchesOn
desc: The configured match-on keys.

name: once
desc: Marks this prop to resolve once, optionally keyed and time-limited.

name: onceKey
desc: The key used for once tracking, if any.

name: prepend
desc: Prepends to a merge path and returns this prop for chaining.

name: prependsAtPaths
desc: The configured prepend paths.

name: prependsAtRoot
desc: Whether prepends happen at the root.

name: refresh
desc: Enables or disables refresh behavior.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves the prop when included; otherwise throws.

name: resolver
desc: The resolver that produces the prop value.

name: shouldDeepMerge
desc: Whether this prop should be merged deeply.

name: shouldDefer
desc: Whether the prop should be deferred.

name: shouldInclude
desc: Whether this prop should be included for the current context.

name: shouldMerge
desc: Whether this prop should be merged.

name: shouldRefresh
desc: Whether this prop should refresh.

name: shouldResolveOnce
desc: Whether this prop should resolve once.

name: ttl
desc: The configured time-to-live, if any.

name: until
desc: Sets the time-to-live for once values.

name: withKey
desc: Sets a stable once key for this prop.

name: ErrorHandlingMiddleware
desc: Provides error handling for Inertia middleware chains.

name: ErrorHandlingMiddleware.new
desc: Creates an error handling middleware.

name: handle
desc: Catches errors and delegates to onError when provided.

name: onError
desc: Optional error handler that converts errors to responses.

name: HttpSsrGateway
desc: Provides an HTTP-based SSR gateway implementation.

name: HttpSsrGateway.new
desc: Creates a gateway targeting endpoint.

name: endpoint
desc: The SSR render endpoint.

name: healthCheck
desc: Performs a health check against the SSR server.

name: healthEndpoint
desc: Optional health check endpoint override.

name: render
desc: Renders pageJson via POST and returns the SSR response.

name: InertiaAssetManifest
desc: Loads and resolves Vite-style asset manifests for Inertia apps.

name: InertiaAssetManifest.fromJson
desc: Creates a manifest from a decoded JSON map.

name: InertiaAssetManifest.fromJsonString
desc: Creates a manifest from a JSON string.

name: InertiaAssetManifest.new
desc: Creates a manifest from pre-parsed entries.

name: entries
desc: Manifest entries keyed by source path.

name: entry
desc: Returns the manifest entry for source, if present.

name: load
desc: Loads and parses the manifest file at path.

name: renderTags
desc: Renders all tags for source into a single HTML string.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves all assets needed for source, including imports and CSS.

name: scriptTags
desc: Returns script tags for source.

name: styleTags
desc: Returns style tags for source.

name: InertiaAssetManifestEntry
desc: Defines a single entry from a Vite asset manifest.

name: InertiaAssetManifestEntry.fromJson
desc: Creates a manifest entry from decoded JSON.

name: InertiaAssetManifestEntry.new
desc: Creates a manifest entry with explicit fields.

name: assets
desc: Additional assets referenced by this entry.

name: css
desc: The CSS files associated with this entry.

name: file
desc: The built file path produced by Vite.

name: imports
desc: Imported entry keys.

name: isEntry
desc: Whether this entry is a top-level entry point.

name: src
desc: The source entry path.

name: InertiaAssetResolution
desc: Represents resolved assets for a manifest entry.

name: InertiaAssetResolution.new
desc: Creates an asset resolution result.

name: assets
desc: The resolved static assets.

name: css
desc: The resolved CSS files.

name: file
desc: The main JavaScript file, if any.

name: imports
desc: The resolved import files.

name: InertiaHandler
desc: Handler signature for Inertia middleware chains.

name: InertiaHeaderUtils
desc: Parses Inertia-specific request headers into strongly typed values.

name: getErrorBag
desc: Returns the trimmed error bag name, if present and non-empty.

name: getExceptOnceProps
desc: Parses the except-once header into a trimmed list of prop keys.

name: getMergeIntent
desc: Returns the normalized merge intent string, if present.

name: getPartialComponent
desc: Returns the partial component header value, if present.

name: getPartialData
desc: Parses the partial data header into a trimmed list of prop keys.

name: getPartialExcept
desc: Parses the partial-except header into a trimmed list of prop keys.

name: getResetKeys
desc: Parses the reset header into a trimmed list of prop keys.

name: getVersion
desc: Returns the asset version if the header is present.

name: isInertiaRequest
desc: Returns true if headers mark this as an Inertia request.

name: isPartialReload
desc: Returns true when headers indicate a partial reload request.

name: InertiaHeaders
desc: Defines canonical HTTP header names used by the Inertia protocol.

name: inertia
desc: Header that marks a request or response as an Inertia exchange.

name: inertiaErrorBag
desc: Header naming the error bag for validation errors.

name: inertiaExceptOnceProps
desc: Header listing once props to exclude from a response.

name: inertiaInfiniteScrollMergeIntent
desc: Header carrying infinite-scroll merge intent.

name: inertiaLocation
desc: Header used for location visits on version mismatches.

name: inertiaPartialComponent
desc: Header naming the component for a partial reload.

name: inertiaPartialData
desc: Header listing requested props for a partial reload.

name: inertiaPartialExcept
desc: Header listing props to exclude during a partial reload.

name: inertiaReset
desc: Header listing merge props to reset.

name: inertiaVary
desc: Header used for HTTP cache variance.

name: inertiaVersion
desc: Header that communicates the current asset version.

name: InertiaMiddleware
desc: Defines middleware interfaces for Inertia request handling.

name: handle
desc: Handles request and delegates to next when appropriate.

name: InertiaProp
desc: Defines the core property interfaces used by Inertia props.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves the property value based on the context.

name: shouldInclude
desc: Whether this property should be included in the response.

name: InertiaRequest
desc: Defines a parsed request wrapper for Inertia headers and context helpers.

name: InertiaRequest.new
desc: Creates an Inertia request wrapper from raw HTTP data.

name: body
desc: The request body, if available.

name: createContext
desc: Creates a PropertyContext for resolving props.

name: createDeferredContext
desc: Creates a deferred PropertyContext for the requested groups.

name: createPartialContext
desc: Creates a partial reload PropertyContext with explicit prop lists.

name: errorBag
desc: The error bag name, if any.

name: exceptOnceProps
desc: The once-prop exclusions, if any.

name: headers
desc: The original request headers.

name: isInertia
desc: Whether this request is an Inertia request.

name: isPartialReload
desc: Whether this request represents a partial reload.

name: mergeIntent
desc: The merge intent string, if any.

name: method
desc: The HTTP method for this request.

name: partialComponent
desc: The partial reload component name, if any.

name: partialData
desc: The requested partial prop keys, if any.

name: partialExcept
desc: The excluded partial prop keys, if any.

name: resetKeys
desc: The merge reset keys, if any.

name: url
desc: The request URL as a string.

name: version
desc: The Inertia asset version, if provided.

name: InertiaResponse
desc: Defines the response payload for Inertia requests.

name: InertiaResponse.html
desc: Creates an HTML response for initial visits.

name: InertiaResponse.json
desc: Creates a JSON response for Inertia requests.

name: InertiaResponse.location
desc: Creates a location response for version mismatches.

name: InertiaResponse.new
desc: Creates a response with the given page and metadata.

name: headers
desc: The headers to include in the response.

name: html
desc: The optional HTML body for initial visits.

name: isInertia
desc: Whether this response is an Inertia JSON response.

name: page
desc: The page data for this response.

name: statusCode
desc: The HTTP status code for the response.

name: toJson
desc: Converts page to a JSON-serializable map.

name: toJsonString
desc: Encodes page to a JSON string.

name: InertiaResponseFactory
desc: Builds Inertia page payloads and responses.

name: buildPageData
desc: Builds a PageData payload with resolved props.

name: jsonResponse
desc: Builds an Inertia JSON response with resolved props.

name: InertiaSerializable
desc: Defines an object that can serialize itself for Inertia props.

name: toInertia
desc: Returns a JSON-serializable map for use in Inertia props.

name: InertiaSettings
desc: Defines configuration settings for the Inertia core package.

name: InertiaSettings.new
desc: Creates configuration settings with optional SSR overrides.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of these settings with updated values.

name: ssr
desc: The detailed SSR settings.

name: ssrEnabled
desc: Whether SSR is enabled.

name: ssrEndpoint
desc: The SSR render endpoint, if configured.

name: version
desc: The asset version string.

name: InertiaSharedProps
desc: Stores shared props applied to every Inertia response.

name: addAll
desc: Adds props to the shared prop set.

name: all
desc: Returns an immutable snapshot of all shared props.

name: isEmpty
desc: Whether there are no shared props.

name: set
desc: Sets a single shared prop by key.

name: InertiaSsrSettings
desc: Defines SSR configuration and helpers for Inertia.

name: InertiaSsrSettings.new
desc: Creates SSR settings with optional overrides.

name: bundle
desc: The SSR bundle path, if configured.

name: bundleCandidates
desc: Candidate bundle paths used by SsrBundleDetector.

name: bundleDetector
desc: Returns a bundle detector based on this configuration.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of these settings with updated values.

name: enabled
desc: Whether SSR is enabled.

name: endpoint
desc: The SSR render endpoint, if configured.

name: ensureBundleExists
desc: Whether to ensure the bundle exists on startup.

name: environment
desc: Environment variables passed to the SSR process.

name: healthEndpoint
desc: Optional health check endpoint override.

name: resolveHealthEndpoint
desc: Resolves the health endpoint based on endpoint.

name: resolveRenderEndpoint
desc: Resolves the render endpoint, appending /render when needed.

name: resolveShutdownEndpoint
desc: Resolves the shutdown endpoint based on endpoint.

name: runtime
desc: The runtime used to execute the SSR bundle.

name: runtimeArgs
desc: Arguments passed to the SSR runtime.

name: shutdownEndpoint
desc: Optional shutdown endpoint override.

name: workingDirectory
desc: Working directory used by the SSR process.

name: InertiaTestExtensions
desc: Adds Inertia assertions to TestResponse.

name: assertInertia
desc: Asserts this response is an Inertia response.

name: InertiaViteAssetTags
desc: Represents resolved Vite asset tags for rendering.

desc: Creates a tag bundle for scripts and styles.

name: devServerUrl
desc: The dev server URL, if running in dev mode.

name: renderAll
desc: Renders styles and scripts into a single HTML string.

name: renderScripts
desc: Renders script tags into a single HTML string.

name: renderStyles
desc: Renders style tags into a single HTML string.

name: scripts
desc: The script tags to render.

name: styles
desc: The style tags to render.

name: fallbackScript

desc: Path to the Vite hot file used in dev mode.

name: includeReactRefresh

name: manifestPath
desc: Path to the Vite manifest file.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves tag bundles for the current environment.

desc: Creates a page payload with version and history flags from headers.

desc: Creates a middleware that appends shared props.

desc: Detects the SSR bundle path from configured candidates.

desc: Creates a bundle detector.

name: bundle
desc: The explicit bundle path, if provided.

name: candidates
desc: Additional candidate bundle paths.

desc: Returns the first existing bundle path, or null if none exist.

desc: The directory used to resolve relative paths.

desc: Defines the interface for SSR gateways.

desc: Performs a health check against the SSR server.

name: render
desc: Renders pageJson and returns the SSR response.

name: SsrResponse
desc: Defines the response payload from an SSR gateway.

desc: Creates an SSR response payload.

name: body
desc: The rendered HTML body.

name: head
desc: The rendered HTML head content.

name: statusCode
desc: The HTTP status code returned by the SSR server.

name: SsrServerConfig
desc: Defines configuration needed to start a local SSR server process.

desc: Creates a server configuration from settings.

desc: Creates a server configuration.

name: bundle
desc: The SSR bundle path, if configured.

name: bundleCandidates
desc: Candidate bundle paths used for resolution.

name: environment
desc: Environment variables for the SSR process.

name: resolveBundle
desc: Resolves the SSR bundle path, if present.

name: runtime
desc: The runtime used to execute the SSR bundle.

name: runtimeArgs
desc: Arguments passed to the SSR runtime.

name: workingDirectory
desc: Working directory for the SSR process.

name: VersionMiddleware
desc: Provides middleware to enforce asset version checks.

desc: Creates a version-checking middleware.

desc: Returns a location response when the version mismatches.

desc: Resolves the redirect location on version mismatch.

desc: Provides dart:io helpers for Inertia requests and responses.

desc: Pipes an SSR process stdout/stderr to stdoutSink and stderrSink.

desc: Starts, monitors, and stops a local SSR server process.

name: stopSsrServer
desc: Sends a shutdown request to the SSR server and returns true on success.

name: writeInertiaResponse
desc: Writes an InertiaResponse to a dart:io HttpResponse.
